1464660.name: Planet Cracker Demo
1464660.description:
Have you ever played Space Invaders back in your childhood? Then, Planet Cracker is for you!

Planet Cracker is the first game from an indivisual developer: KSKNemoto.
It took a style of casual mini-game which can be played about 5-10 minutes par a day, and takes about 1-2 hours to complete.

The game is still in development, and will take major update in January 2021 to sell the game as finished product with reasonable price.

features I’m Planning to Add the Game:

  • Varied debris like having cone shape, and more random falling angle and velocity
  • Varied helpers like shooting homing missile, instead of liner projectile
  • HARD difficulty featuing more persistent debris
  • Better starting menu, and loading scene graphics
  • Implementing feedbacks from Beta testers and early access players
  • Steam Achievements
